game.name: White Chocolate Berry Cheesecake
game.description:
It is a time for a delicious dessert, ladies! Where are you and what are you doing? Many girls visit our website every day to learn how to prepare this favorite recipe of all. Hope you will play White Chocolate Berry Cheesecake and return your kitchen with the improved chef skills. This real piece of cake will satisfy your tasting buds to the fullest and leaves you wanting more. Make sure that you collect all the right ingredients before making the preparation for the recipe. Show off your best in this free online cooking game for girls! 

You will be provided with the proper guidance throughout the entire preparation process. Follow each and every indicated step to complete the goal of this brand new kitchen game. The soft texture of Cheesecake makes it one of the best desserts. However, we can say that you have not ever attempted a white chocolate one. Believe us and try it out once to enjoy the sweetness with some flavorful berries.  

Start this cool cooking game with arranging some biscuits in a pan that you can see in a rounded shape. Take a bowl and mix some water and gelatin into it. Let the gelatin dissolve into water. Let the white chocolate melt in the microwave. Then start preparing the cheesecake mixture. Take some cream cheese, gelatin, vanilla, sugar and milk and mix all of them into a bowl. Blend this mixture with the melted chocolate. Add some delicious berries on top of the biscuits that you see in a pan. Also add the remaining berries with cream cheese mixture. Create a nice combination of flavors with raspberries, blueberries and strawberries. Place it in the freeze to cool it down. Itâ€™s ready to serve now! Good luck girls!
